name: Go home, you're drunk!
summary: Created by ETeeski (code), DanielSND (Art), and PXLDJ (Music & Sound) in 15 hours! (including polish, it was more like 20 hours). We created this game in a self-proclaimed game jam for the purpose of promoting the Ultimate GameDev Tutorials Kickstarter. The theme of this game jam was chosen by the audience of the livestream, which was "Parkour".
